name: Admiral Motti (A)
effect: Anytime a Jedi Character can attack Motti, that Character must do so. As long as Motti is in the Character arena, your Jedi Characters can attack Motti.

name: Air Cover
effect: One of your Ground units gets +3 power for this attack. Play only if you have more units in the Space arena than your opponent.

name: Astromech Assistance
effect: Pay 1 Force -> Remove up to 2 damage counters from one of your Space units.

name: Benefits of Training
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Each of your Soldiers in the Ground arena gets Accuracy 1 until end of turn (add +1 to each of those units' attack dice).

name: Beru Lars (A)
effect: Discard Beru from the Character arena -> Return a Character card from your discard pile to your hand. Play only during your build step.

name: Biggs Darklighter (A)
effect: Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets "Discard this Starfighter and Biggs from the Space arena -> Prevent all damage to one of your other Space units."

name: Blaster Barrage
effect: Pay 5 Force -> For this attack, you may divide the damage done by the attacking unit between the defending unit and another of your opponent's units in the same arena as the defending unit. Play only when one of your units is attacking (before you roll attack dice).

name: C-3PO (C)
effect: As long as C-3PO is in the Character arena, each of your neutral units cost 1 less build counter to deploy.

name: Capture the Falcon
effect: Choose one of your opponent's Space units. Tap that unit.

name: Commander Praji (A)
effect: As long as Praji is in the Character arena, each of your other Characters gets +10 speed.

name: Contingency Plan
effect: Remove all build counters from each of your partially built cards in the build zone. You get that many extra build points this turn.

name: Dannik Jerriko (A)
effect:
Stun 3 (When Dannik damages another unit, that unit gets -3 power until end of turn.)
When Dannik damages a Character, remove 1 damage counter from Dannik.

name: Darth Vader (A)
effect:
When Vader attacks a Character other than a Jedi Knight or Jedi Master, you may pay Force equal to that Character's total build cost. If you do, that Character retreats when Vader's attack ends.
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2 (Prevent up to 2 damage to Vader.)
Pay 1 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your Characters in the same arena as Vader, it now attacks Vader instead.)

name: Darth Vader (B)
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Vader gets +2 power for this attack.
Pay 3 Force -> Evade 3 (Prevent up to 3 damage to Vader.)

name: Darth Vader (C)
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2 (Prevent up to 2 damage to Vader.)
Pay 1 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your Characters in the same arena as Vader, it now attacks Vader instead.)

name: Death Star Cannon Tower
effect: Ion Cannon 3 (This unit may attack a unit in the Space arena instead of a unit in the Ground arena, using 3 power plus any other effects.)

name: Death Star Hangar Bay
effect: Tap, Pay 1 build point -> Choose an untapped Space unit with power 5 or less. Tap that unit. Play only during your build step.

name: Death Star Plans
effect: Pay 6 Force -> Choose one of your opponent's units in the Space arena. This turn, each of your units in the Space arena gets Critical Hit 3 as long as it's attacking that unit (each of those units does 3 more damage if you roll at least one natural six).

name: Death Star Scanning Technician
effect: When you deploy this unit, look at your opponent's hand. Choose one of those cards. Your opponent discards that card.

name: Death Star Superlaser Gunner
effect: Tap -> This turn, each of your Space units gets +2 Power as long as it's using Bombard to attack a Ground unit. Play only during your build step.

name: Death Star Turbolaser Gunner
effect: Tap -> This turn, each of your Ground units gets +2 Power as long as it's using Ion Cannon to attack a Space unit. Play only during your build step.

name: Demonstration of Power
effect: Each of your Dark Side units that currently has power 5 or more gets +3 power until end of turn.

name: Desperate Confrontation
effect: Each of your units gets "Pay 1 Force -> This unit gets +2 power for this attack" until end of turn.

name: Destroy Alderaan
effect: Your opponent discards his or her hand.

name: Devastator (A)
effect:
Shields 1 (Each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking Devastator.)
As long as it's attacking a Rebel Space unit, Devastator gets +2 power.

name: Dianoga (A)
effect: Tap -> Choose an untapped Character with power 4 or less. Tap that character. Play only during battle.

name: Disrupt the Power System
effect: Your opponent's units can't use Bombard or Ion Cannon this turn. You gain +1 Force.

name: Dissolve the Senate
effect: Discard all Diplomats (yours and your opponent's) from the Character arena.

name: Disturbance in the Force
effect: Your opponent can't play activated abilities this turn. (Activated abilities are abilities on units that include the -> symbol.)

name: Domesticated Bantha
effect: As long as you have one or more Tuskens in any arena, this unit gets +2 power.

name: EG-6 Power Droid
effect: Tap -> Untap one of your other Droids in the Character arena. (It can attack again.) Play only when this unit would attack and only once per turn.

name: Elite Stormtrooper Squad
effect:
Critical Hit 1 (This unit does 1 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)

name: Error in Judgment
effect: Choose one of your opponent's partially built cards. Unless your opponent pays 5 Force, he or she discards that card.

name: Fate of the Dragon
effect: Pay 12 Force -> One of your units gets +10 power for this attack.

name: Figrin D'an (A)
effect: As long as Figrin is in the Character arena, each of your opponent's Characters gets -10 speed and -1 power.

name: General Dodonna (A)
effect: Tap -> One of your units gets Accuracy 1 until end of turn (add +1 to each of that unit's attack dice). Play only during your build step.

name: General Tagge (A)
effect: As long as Tagge is in the Character arena, you can't play Battle cards and each of your Capital Ships gets +1 Power.

name: Greedo (A)
effect: When the Character battle step starts, your opponent may pay 3 Force. If he or she does, retreat Greedo.

name: Ground Support
effect: One of your Space units gets +3 power for this attack. Play only if you have more units in the Ground arena than your opponent.

name: Han's Courage
effect: Pay 4 Force -> One of your Characters gets +2 power and Accuracy 1 for this attack (add +1 to each of that Character's attack dice).

name: Hold 'Em Off
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Each of your Characters gets +10 speed and Stun 2 until end of turn.

name: Imperial Blockade
effect: To complete Imperial Blockade, you must also pay 8 Force. Your opponent can't spend build points this turn.

name: Imperial Control Station
effect: As long as this unit is in the Ground arena, each of your Imperial Starfighters gets +1 power.

name: Imperial Detention Block
effect: Tap -> Choose an untapped non-Jedi character. Tap that Character. Play only during your build step.

name: Imperial Manipulation
effect: When the battle phase starts, move 1 damage counter from one unit to another unit in the same arena. (This can't be prevented.)

name: Imperial Navy Helmsman
effect: Capital Ship Pilot. The Capital Ship gets +20 speed.

name: Imperial Navy Lieutenant
effect: Transport Pilot. The Transport gets +1 power.

name: Imperial Sentry Droid
effect: When the battle phase ends, if this unit is in the Character arena, look at your opponent's hand.

name: Imperial Star Destroyer
effect: Bombard 3 (This unit may attack a unit in the Ground arena instead of a unit in the Space arena, using 3 power plus any other effects.)

name: Incom T-16 Skyhopper
effect: Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)

name: Insignificant Power
effect: Your opponent loses 4 Force. (If your opponent has 4 or less Force, he or she loses all of it.)

name: Into Hiding
effect: Choose an untapped non-Jedi Character. Tap that character.

name: Into the Garbage Chute
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Prevent all damage to one of your units in the Character arena. Retreat that unit.

name: It's Not Over Yet
effect: Pay 5 Force -> Choose an arena. Untap all units in that arena. Fight another battle in that arena. Play only if all units in all arenas are tapped.

name: IT-0 Interrogator Droid
effect: Tap -> Look at your opponent's hand. If there are any Battle or Mission cards there, choose one of them. Your opponent discards that card. Play only during your build step.

name: Jawa Collection Team
effect: As long as this unit is attacking a Droid, it gets Stun 4 (when this unit damages another unit, that unit gets -4 power until end of turn).

name: Jawa Leader
effect: As long as this unit is in the Character arena, each other Jawa (yours and your opponent's) gets +1 power.

name: Jawa Squad
effect: Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)

name: Jawa Supply Trip
effect: Take a Droid unit card from your hand. Show it to your opponent and put it in your build zone. Put 1 build counter on it for each Jawa you have in any arena.

name: Jedi Extinction
effect: Your opponent can't put Jedi into the Character arena during his or her build step this turn. If your opponent deploys a Jedi this turn, that Jedi stays in his or her build zone.

name: Jedi Intervention
effect: One of your units gets "Pay 2 Force -> Intercept" until end of turn. (If a unit is attacking one of your units in the same arena as the intercepting unit, the attacking unit now attacks the intercepting unit instead.)

name: Jon "Dutch" Vander (A)
effect: Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets Stun 3 (when it damages another unit, that unit gets -3 power until end of turn).

name: Jump to Lightspeed
effect: Return one of your units from the Space arena to your hand. (Also return all cards stacked with it and its Pilot, if any, to your hand.)

name: Krayt Dragon
effect: When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, untap this unit. (It can attack again.)

name: Learning the Force
effect: You gain +1 Force for each of your Characters in any arena.

name: Leia's Kiss
effect: Pay 3 Force -> One of your units gets +30 speed and Accuracy 1 until end of turn (add +1 to that unit's attack dice).

name: LIN Demolitionmech
effect: Tap -> This unit does 2 damage to each other Character in the Character arena (yours and your opponent's). Play only when this unit would attack.

name: Luke Skywalker (A)
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 1 (Prevent 1 damage to Luke.)
Tap -> Search your deck. You may take a Luke Skywalker card from your deck. Show it to your opponent and put it in your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Play only during your build step.

name: Luke Skywalker (B)
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 1 (Prevent 1 damage to Luke.)
Pay 2 Force -> Luke gets +20 speed until end of turn.

name: Luke Skywalker (C)
effect: As long as you have another Jedi in the Character arena, Luke gets +2 power and "Pay 3 Force -> Evade 1 (Prevent 1 damage to Luke)."

name: Luke Skywalker (D)
effect:
Speeder Pilot. The Speeder gets:
* +20 speed.
* Critical Hit 2 as long as it's attacking a Creature (it does 2 more damage if you roll at least one natural six).

name: Luke's Repairs
effect: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your damaged units.

name: Luke's Speeder (A)
effect: Discard Luke's Speeder from the Ground arena -> Show one of your partially built Space unit cards to your opponent. Put 3 build counters on it. Play only during your build step.

name: Luke's Warning
effect: Pay 2 Force -> Prevent up to 3 damage to one of your Characters, or prevent 1 damage to one of your Space or Ground units.

name: Luke's X-wing (A)
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of Luke's X-wing's attack dice.)
Shields 1 (Each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking Luke's X-wing.)

name: Moisture Farm
effect: Discard this unit from the Ground arena -> Return a Jedi Character card from your discard pile to your hand. Play only during your build step.

name: Momaw Nadon (A)
effect: As long as Momaw is in the Character arena, each Stormtrooper in that arena gets -20 speed.

name: Most Desperate Hour
effect: Pay 5 Force -> One of your Starfighters gets Critical Hit 6 until end of turn (that unit does 6 more damage if you roll at least one natural six). Tap all your other units in the Space arena. Play only before any of your Space units attack.

name: Mounted Stormtrooper
effect: Discard this unit from the Ground arena -> Show one of your partially built Stormtrooper Character cards to your opponent. Put 2 build counters on it. Play only during your build step.

name: Mouse Droid
effect: Tap, Pay 1 build point -> Draw a card. Play only during your build step.

name: No Escape
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Choose a Character in your opponent's build zone. Put that Character into the Character arena. If that Character is tapped, untap that Character.

name: Nowhere to Run
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Choose a Ground unit in your opponent's build zone. Put that unit into the Ground arena. If it's tapped, untap it.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi (E)
effect:
Each non-Jedi Character gets -2 power as long as it's attacking Obi-Wan.
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2 (Prevent up to 2 damage to Obi-Wan.)

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi (F)
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2 (Prevent up to 2 damage to Obi-Wan.)
Pay 1 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your Characters in the same arena as Obi-Wan, it now attacks Obi-Wan instead.)
When Obi-Wan is discarded from the Character arena, you gain +4 Force.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi (G)
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2 (Prevent up to 2 damage to Obi-Wan.)
Pay 1 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your Characters in the same arena as Obi-Wan, it now attacks Obi-Wan instead.)

name: Obi-Wan's Plan
effect: Tap one of your untapped units in the Character arena -> One of your other Characters gets +40 speed until end of turn.

name: Obi-Wan's Prowess
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Prevent up to 2 damage to one of your Characters. That Character may do that much damage to a Character of your choice in the same arena.

name: Obi-Wan's Task
effect:
To complete Obi-Wan's Task, you must also tap one of your untapped Jedi in the Character arena.
You get +3 build points this turn.

name: Oil Bath
effect: Remove up to 4 total damage counters from any number of units in one arena.

name: Our Only Hope
effect: You may complete Our Only Hope only if you have exactly 1 other partially built card. Discard your hand and put 4 build counters on that card.

name: Owen Lars (A)
effect: Discard Owen from the Character arena -> Choose one of your Characters. That Character can't be attacked this turn. Play only during your build step.

name: Penetrate the Shields
effect: One of your units gets +3 power for this attack if it's attacking a unit with shields.

name: Plan of Attack
effect: To complete Plan of Attack, you must also tap one of your untapped units in the Character arena. Search your deck. You may take a Battle card from your deck. Show it to your opponent and put it in your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Precise Blast
effect: Pay 2 Force -> One of your Ground units gets +4 power for this attack.

name: Preemptive Shot
effect: Pay 2 Force -> One of your Characters gets +4 power for this attack.

name: Press the Advantage
effect: Choose one: Clone, Droid, or Jedi. Each unit of that type gets -3 power until end of turn.

name: Princess Leia (A)
effect:
When the battle phase ends, if Leia is in the Character arena, your opponent loses 1 Force.
When one of your opponent's Characters would damage Leia, prevent that damage unless your opponent pays 2 Force.

name: Princess Leia (B)
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of Leia's attack dice.)
When one of your opponent's Characters would damage Leia, prevent that damage unless your opponent pays 2 Force.

name: Princess Leia (C)
effect: When Leia is discarded from the Character arena, draw 3 cards.

name: Protection of the Master
effect: Tap one of your untapped Jedi in any arena -> Prevent all damage to one of your other Jedi in that arena.

name: R2-D2 (C)
effect: Tap -> Look at the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck. Put them back in any order. Play only during your build step.

name: R5-D4 (A)
effect:
When R5-D4 attacks, you may give it +1 power for that attack. If you do, when the attack ends, R5-D4 does 2 damage to itself.
When R5-D4 is discarded from the Character arena, search your deck. You may take an Astromech Droid card from your deck. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Rebel Blockade Runner
effect:
Tap -> Draw a card. Play only during your build step.
When one of your opponent's effects causes you to discard this card from your hand, you may put it into the Space arena from your discard pile.

name: Rebel Control Officer
effect: As long as this unit is in the Character arena, each of your other Rebels gets +10 speed and +1 power.

name: Rebel Control Post
effect: Tap -> Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck. Choose any number of Space unit cards there and put them into your opponent's discard pile. Put the rest back on top in any order. Play only when this unit would attack.

name: Rebel Crew Chief
effect: Tap -> Show one of your partially built Starfighter cards to your opponent. Put 1 build counter on it. Play only during your build step.

name: Rebel Fighter Wing
effect:
Critical Hit 2 (This unit does 2 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)
This unit gets -1 power for each damage counter on it.

name: Rebel Lieutenant
effect:
Capital Ship Pilot. The Capital Ship gets:
* +10 speed.
* +1 power.
* As long as this unit is in the Space arena, each of your other Space units gets +10 speed.

name: Rebel Marine
effect: This unit can't attack if you have no units in the Space arena.

name: Rebel Marine Squad
effect: Subtract 1 from each of this unit's attack dice.

name: Rebel Pilot
effect: Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets +20 speed.

name: Rebel Squad
effect: Pay 2 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your units in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)

name: Rebel Surrender
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Choose one of your opponent's units in the Ground or Character arena. If your opponent rolled no hits for that unit's last attack, he or she discards the unit. Play only after the unit has attacked and before any other unit attacks.

name: Rebel Trooper
effect: Pay 2 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your Characters in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)

name: Regroup on Yavin
effect: If you have 2 or more units in each arena, you get +3 build points this turn.

name: Remote Seeker Droid
effect: When the battle phase ends, if you have this unit and a Jedi in the Character arena, you gain +1 Force.

name: Rescue
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Choose one: prevent up to 2 damage to one of your units, or one of your units gets +3 power for this attack.

name: Sandtrooper
effect: As long as this unit is attacking a Tatooine Character, it gets Critical Hit 2 (it does 2 more damage if you roll at least one natural six).

name: Slipping Through
effect: Pay 8 Force -> Choose an arena. Prevent all damage that would be done by units in that arena until end of turn.

name: Stabilize Deflectors
effect: Pay 2 Force -> Each of your Starfighters gets Shields 1 until end of turn (each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking one of those Starfighters).

name: Star Destroyer Commander
effect: Capital Ship Pilot. The Capital Ship gets Critical Hit 2 (it does 2 more damage if you roll at least one natural six).

name: Starfighter's End
effect: Pay 6 Force -> Choose one of your untapped Starfighters in the Space arena and one of your opponent's units in that arena. For each 10 speed your Starfighter has, it does 1 damage to that unit. Then discard your Starfighter from the Space arena. Play only if no unit is attacking.

name: Stay Sharp
effect: Pay 2 Force -> One of your units gets +1 power and Critical Hit 1 for this attack (that unit does 1 extra damage if you roll at least one natural six).

name: Stormtrooper Assault Team
effect: Damage from this unit's attack can't be prevented.

name: Stormtrooper Charge
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Each of your Stormtroopers gets +1 power until end of turn.

name: Stormtrooper DV-523
effect: This unit gets -2 power as long as it's attacking a unique Character.

name: Stormtrooper DV-692
effect:
This unit gets -2 power as long as it's attacking a unique Character.
Stun 3 (When this unit damages another unit, that unit gets -3 power until end of turn.)

name: Stormtrooper Patrol
effect: Stun 2 (When this unit damages another unit, that unit gets -2 power until end of turn.)

name: Stormtrooper Squad Leader
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)
As long as this unit is in the Character arena, each of your other Stormtroopers gets Accuracy 1.

name: Stormtrooper TK-119
effect:
Pay 1 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your Characters in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)
This unit gets -2 power as long as it's attacking a unique Character.

name: Stormtrooper TK-421
effect: This unit gets -2 power as long as it's attacking a unique Character.

name: Strategy Session
effect: Each of your units gets Accuracy 1 until end of turn (add +1 to each of those units' attack dice).

name: Strike Me Down
effect: Discard one of your Jedi from the Character arena -> You gain +6 Force. Play only if no unit is attacking.

name: Support in the Senate
effect: You get +1 build point for each Diplomat (yours and your opponent's) in the Character arena.

name: Surprise Attack
effect: Your opponent can't play Battle cards this turn.

name: Synchronized Assault
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Each of your Starfighters get Accuracy 1 until end of turn (add +1 to each of those Starfighter's attack dice).

name: Tantive IV (A)
effect:
Shields 1 (Each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking Tantive IV.)
When Tantive IV is discarded from the Space arena, your opponent loses 3 Force.

name: Tarkin's Stench
effect: Pay 12 Force -> Choose an arena. Tap all of your opponent's untapped units in that arena.

name: Tatooine Sandcrawler
effect: Tap -> Seach your deck. You may take a Droid or Jawa card from your deck. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Play only during your build step.

name: Tatooine Speeder
effect: Pay 2 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your units in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)

name: TIE Fighter DS-55-6
effect: Critical Hit 2 (This unit does 2 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)

name: TIE Fighter DS-61-9
effect: Pay 1 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your units in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)

name: TIE Fighter DS-73-3
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your units in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)
Stun 2 (When this unit damages another unit, that unit gets -2 power until end of battle.)

name: TIE Fighter Elite Pilot
effect:
Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets:
* +20 speed.
* Critical Hit 2 (This Starfighter does 2 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)

name: TIE Fighter Pilot
effect: Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets +1 power.

name: TIE Fighter Squad
effect: Pay 2 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your units in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)

name: Tiree (A)
effect:
Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets:
* Pay 2 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your other units in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)
* When this Starfighter is discarded from the Space arena, each of your other Starfighters gets +2 power until end of turn.

name: Tractor Beam
effect: Pay 6 Force -> Choose a Space unit in your opponent's build zone. Put that unit into the Space arena. If it's untapped it, tap it. Until end of turn, each of your units gets Accuracy 1 as long as it's attacking that unit (add +1 to each of those units' attack dice).

name: Tusken Sharpshooter
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)
As long as this unit is in the Character arena, each of your other Tuskens gets Accuracy 1.

name: URoRRuR'R'R (A)
effect: As long as you have more units in the Character arena than your opponent, URoRRuR'R'R gets +2 power.

name: Vader's Grip
effect: Pay 7 Force -> Choose an untapped unit. Tap that unit.

name: Vader's Interference
effect:
To complete Vader's Interference, you must also tap one of your untapped Jedi in the Character arena.
Your opponent gets -3 build points this turn. (If your opponent has 3 or fewer build points, he or she loses all of them.)

name: Vader's Leadership
effect: Pay 9 Force -> Choose an arena. Each of your units in that arena gets +3 power until end of turn.

name: Vader's TIE Fighter (A)
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2 (Prevent up to 2 damage to Vader's TIE Fighter.)
When Vader's TIE Fighter is discarded from the Space arena, you may pay 2 Force. If you do, return Vader's TIE Fighter, all cards stacked with it, and its Pilot, if any, from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Vader's TIE Fighter (B)
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of Vader's TIE Fighter's attack dice.)
Pay 1 Force -> Vader's TIE Fighter gets +1 power for this attack.

name: Victory-Class Star Destroyer
effect: Bombard 2 (This unit may attack a unit in the Ground arena instead of a unit in the Space arena, using 2 power plus any other effects.)

name: Wedge Antilles (A)
effect:
Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets:
* +20 speed.
* +2 power.
* Pay 1 Force -> Retreat this Starfighter. Play only if no unit is attacking and only if this Starfighter has 1 or more damage counters on it.

name: Well-Aimed Shot
effect: Pay 2 Force -> One of your Space units gets +4 power for this attack.

name: Wuher (A)
effect: As long as Wuher is in the Character arena, each Droid (yours and your opponent's) costs 1 more build counter to deploy.

name: X-wing Attack Formation
effect:
Critical Hit 3 (This unit does 3 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 1 (Prevent 1 damage to this unit.)

name: X-wing Red One
effect: When this unit attacks, you may give it +3 power for this attack. If you do, this unit does 2 damage to itself when the attack ends.

name: X-wing Red Three
effect: Pay 2 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your units in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)

name: X-wing Red Two
effect: Shields 1 (Each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking this unit.)

name: Y-wing Gold One
effect: Stun 3 (When this unit damages another unit, that unit gets -3 power until end of turn.)

name: Y-wing Gold Squadron
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your units in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)
Critical Hit 1 (This unit does 1 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)

name: Yavin 4 Hangar Base
effect: Tap -> Search your deck. You may take a Starfighter card from your deck. Show it to your opponent and put it in your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Play only during your build step.

name: YT-1300 Transport
effect: Shields 1 (Each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking this unit.)

name: YV-664 Light Freighter
effect:
Shields 1 (Each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking this unit.)
Discard this unit from the Space arena -> You get +2 build points this turn. Play only during your build step.
